name: Solar Panels
description: Solar panels convert sunlight into electricity. Our selection includes monocrystalline and polycrystalline options for residential and commercial use.

name: Inverters
description: Inverters are essential components that convert the DC electricity generated by solar panels into AC electricity that can be used in your home.

name: Batteries
description: Store excess solar energy for use when the sun isn't shining. Our battery options include lithium-ion and lead-acid technologies.

name: Mounting Systems
description: Mounting systems securely attach solar panels to various roof types or ground installations.

name: Solar Monitoring
description: Monitor the performance of your solar system in real-time with these advanced tracking solutions.

name: Residential Solar
description: Complete solar solutions designed specifically for residential properties.

name: Commercial Solar
description: Scalable solar solutions for businesses of all sizes to reduce operational costs.

name: Off-Grid Systems
description: Complete systems for locations without access to the electrical grid.

name: Grid-Tied Systems
description: Solar systems that connect to the utility grid for optimal efficiency and backup.
